title: Impact of Tailoring BTBT-based Hole-Transporting Materials on Perovskite Photovoltaics under Indoor Illumination
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00998C, Paper
Lal Chand, Prasun Kumar , Rahul Tiwari , Milon Kundar, Suman Kalyan Pal, Vibha Saxena, Ranbir Singh, Surya Prakash Singh
Small organic molecules have attracted interest as hole-transporting material (HTM) in perovskite photovoltaics (PPVs) due to their stability, tailoring the cost, and improving device performance. To achieve optimal performance in...
